item.title: ## Meeting Notes - Production and Development Tasks
item.description: Meeting Notes - Production and Development Tasks 2025-06-02 Actions: ☑️ Remove (oauth_provider_id, oauth_sub) idx (in favor of optics[?]) ☑️ Deploy to staging following ☑️ Test in staging ☑️ Deploy to production Kiwi: ☑️ “Tap to copy” should probably be pressable ☑️ Add zip share button (location share) ☑️ Level up pre-entry ☑️ Update app icon Right Side Box: Cashapp offer What do we do if we can’t get fluent to raise caps.
item.content:
Meeting Notes - Production and Development Tasks

2025-06-02

Actions:

  • ☑️ Remove (oauth_provider_id, oauth_sub) idx (in favor of optics[?])
  • ☑️ Deploy to staging following
  • ☑️ Test in staging
  • ☑️ Deploy to production

Kiwi:

  • ☑️ “Tap to copy” should probably be pressable
  • ☑️ Add zip share button (location share)
  • ☑️ Level up pre-entry
  • ☑️ Update app icon

Right Side Box:

  • Cashapp offer
  • What do we do if we can’t get fluent to raise caps.
  • $600k gross profit
  • $100k playful [unclear: shar] after base pay
  • Applatin internally - Ad creation
    • $60k
    • Cool hire a

Bottom Section:

PP Tax

Right Side Box:

  • Intelligence AI
  • Rosterbook → ATD → Obsidian
  • Personal Sep
  • OP: Transparency

Diagram Description: The image contains several rectangular boxes drawn around different sections of text, creating visual separation between different topics or categories of tasks and notes.

item.title: ## Appuser Effect System Design Notes
item.description: Appuser Effect System Design Notes Appuser Effect Structure Appuser Effect / \ Appuser Effect Key Components: Appusers: Jobs :: Accruve - series Records (Appuser Effect) Appusers: AppuserSpecial offers :: {Claim, process} both offer examples of AppuserEffect creation AppuserEffects: Jobs :: Complex more appuserEffects in Complex Player: Appusors :: Advice :: CeaseReward shows usage of AppuserEffect + Effect so Cease bonus Rewards Effect should be RewardableSub Burn Sources ☐ Fluent ☐ Protege offers ☐ Protege Magic Receipts ☐ Protege Surveys ☐ Ravil ☐ HostGrid /Bestios ☐ Knucer Process Flow Diagram POST Request Flow:
item.content:
Appuser Effect System Design Notes

Appuser Effect Structure

Appuser Effect
/ \
Appuser Effect

Key Components:

  • Appusers: Jobs :: Accruve - series Records (Appuser Effect)
  • Appusers: AppuserSpecial offers :: {Claim, process} both offer examples of AppuserEffect creation
  • AppuserEffects: Jobs :: Complex more appuserEffects in Complex
  • Player: Appusors :: Advice :: CeaseReward shows usage of AppuserEffect + Effect so Cease bonus Rewards
    • Effect should be RewardableSub

Burn Sources

  • ☐ Fluent
  • ☐ Protege offers
  • ☐ Protege Magic Receipts
  • ☐ Protege Surveys
  • ☐ Ravil
  • ☐ HostGrid /Bestios
  • ☐ Knucer

Process Flow Diagram

POST Request Flow:

POST → Find or Create → Find or Create
(send code) Idle 24-hour Appuser Archive
Effect Effect
\ /
- - - - - - -

Event Processing:

Receive Born Source → Appusers::AppuserEffects:: Apply Born Modifiers
Event (Reward, appuser)
|
BOOSTED
|
Add another
use Reward
Record

Diagrams Present

  1. Hierarchical Structure Diagram: Shows the relationship between Appuser Effect, Appuser, and Effect components
  2. Process Flow Diagram: Illustrates the POST request workflow with find/create operations and a 24-hour effect duration
  3. Event Processing Flow: Shows how born source events trigger appuser effects and boost rewards

item.title: ## Software Development Sprint Planning Notes
item.description: Software Development Sprint Planning Notes Date: 2024-10-28 Sponsored By: [unclear] Playful Rewards: ☑️ Test Attraction ☐ Push Up Social Auth (Staging + Client Builds + Firebase) ☐ App Usage Tracking Sync w/ Adam: 2.3.4 • What are our goals exactly ← • How is what we provide summary ☑️ Send Adam Credentials.enc.yml changes for [lead-accar-auth] ☐ Onboarding Wizard v2 (Quick vs Big) UserWise: ☐ Mongo 5 → 6 • Staging 0 Production ☐ Planned Changes >_< ☐ Workers during?
item.content:
Software Development Sprint Planning Notes

Date: 2024-10-28
Sponsored By: [unclear]

Playful Rewards:

  • ☑️ Test Attraction
  • ☐ Push Up Social Auth (Staging + Client Builds + Firebase)
  • ☐ App Usage Tracking Sync w/ Adam: 2.3.4
    • • What are our goals exactly ←
    • • How is what we provide summary
  • ☑️ Send Adam Credentials.enc.yml changes for [lead-accar-auth]
  • ☐ Onboarding Wizard v2 (Quick vs Big)

UserWise:

  • ☐ Mongo 5 → 6
  • • Staging 0 Production
  • ☐ Planned Changes >_<
  • ☐ Workers during?
  • ☐ Global Rewrite config
  • ☐ Worker Job (time) ?
  • ☐ Push Notifications (Scheduled Send)

v2.3.4

  • ☑️ Filter Out Recently Played (90-days) ★

[Diamond shape diagram with text inside:] Push Out
???? DEN
Lance Creek
???? [unclear]

Perpetual Call Notes:

  • ☑️ Q1/Q2 for LiveOps? UW then?
  • ☑️ GCP??? Do we host for them?
  • ☑️ How do we integrate UW ↔ PT
    • • UW would be a nice frontend
    • • They would need custom features
  • ☑️ Start SaaS → Self-Hosted (pre-live)

PubSub Realtime Flow

  • ☑️ They provide segments to us.

[Rectangle with “GCP” inside]

[Rectangle with “AUG” inside, heavily outlined]

Note: There is a diamond-shaped diagram in the upper portion containing what appears to be location or project names, and two rectangular boxes labeled “GCP” and “AUG” near the bottom of the notes.

item.title: ## Development Playful Rounds and Technical Updates

item.content:

TikTok + FB + Apps Flyer Keep link clean - deferred

Social Audit

  • Android

    • Google → Apple → [unclear]
    • [unclear] → [unclear] → [unclear]
    • Google → Apple → [unclear]

  • iOS

    • Google → Apple → [unclear]
    • Signup → Signup → [unclear]
    • Login → Login

Userwise

Things to (most)

  • ☑ Frontend Change Sync?

  • ☑ Workers during

  • ☑ Worker Job (TIME advancement)

  • ☑ Push Notifications (scheduled send)

  • ☑ Update segment concrete to use one time

Scalability RPT Focus

Get Client ROMS

Visibility & Observability for Business Analytics

Get $200 by spending $175

Client Roles Means pushing focus on IAPs

Big Updates Now

Then Analytics Revamp

Diagram Description: The image contains a hand-drawn flowchart/mind map structure with various sections connected by lines and boxes. There’s a prominent box at the top right with an arrow pointing to it containing the TikTok/FB/Apps Flyer information. The layout suggests this is a planning or brainstorming document with different development tracks and priorities.

item.title: ## App Development & Monitoring System Design
item.description: App Development & Monitoring System Design Architecture Flow Computer/Server → Property → [Display/LED Strip] ↓ 5v External Power Alloz Integration Alloz ?!?!?! Alloz Speed Run 10 X 12 [dimensions noted] Erebus (LED Strip Simulator?) Features: Device handwriting 📱 → upload tags Intervals: “daily” / “hourly” Package_name = "" App Components AppPlayTime ScheduleWorkers AppPlayTimeTrackingWorker Scheduled Worker (run every hour) Configuration: Pull tracking worker scheduling config (if config interval changed) CancelUnique WorkName (“PR AppPlaytime Tracker”) + enqueue MagicWork System Architecture Diagram [Diagram shows interconnected boxes representing:]
item.content:
App Development & Monitoring System Design

Architecture Flow

Computer/Server → Property → [Display/LED Strip]
↓
5v External Power

Alloz Integration

  • Alloz ?!?!?!
  • Alloz Speed Run
  • 10 X 12 [dimensions noted]

Erebus (LED Strip Simulator?)

Features:

  • Device handwriting
  • 📱 → upload tags

Intervals:

  • “daily” / “hourly”
  • Package_name = ""

App Components

AppPlayTime ScheduleWorkers

  • AppPlayTimeTrackingWorker

Scheduled Worker (run every hour)

Configuration:

  • Pull tracking worker scheduling config
  • (if config interval changed)
  • CancelUnique WorkName (“PR AppPlaytime Tracker”) + enqueue MagicWork

System Architecture Diagram

[Diagram shows interconnected boxes representing:]

  • Erebus (Amplitude Events v2, 3, 4)
  • Corn Rate w/ Ham Justice
  • PR Remote (getIsSeens)
  • Stored Prefs (interval, package_name) → get package_name & interval
  • If interval changed → Tracking Worker
  • CancelUniqueWork & enqueueUniqueWork

AppPlaytimeTrackingWorker

  • Every 🕐 minutes (run @ interval (2sarly))
  • ↑ (Daily query for: This every 8-1 day)

Implementation Notes

  • Hmm… Feeling good
  • Queries for 6 progression
    • If daily → has it been 1+ hour?
    • If daily → has it been 1+ day?

Task List

☐ Take CFL then spread it out

Dimensions & Specifications

  • Multiple references to “10 X 12” dimensions
  • Device appears to be some form of LED display or monitoring system

Diagram Description: The image contains multiple interconnected flowcharts and system diagrams showing the architecture of an app monitoring system. The main flow shows data moving from a computer/server through various processing stages to display components. There are several boxed sections showing different workers and processes, with arrows indicating data flow and dependencies between components.

item.title: ## Release Notes and System Updates
item.description: Release Notes and System Updates Call Notes: Tuned Global Apps to see? Search/Rec APIs Existing: Many object search (Rec contextual to store) Upcoming: [Diagram: Box containing “Wilson Scoring System” with arrow pointing down to “Elastic Scoring System”] Adobe shutting us off (traffic ↗) Update package from Mega [Diagram: Box containing “Universal Music Group in Tuned Catalogue - Music in Demo”] AppLovin Rewarded Videos Ad Pre-tagging Tuned Global for Cold Start [Diagram: Parallelogram shape containing “Playful Rewards (Userwise) Playful Rhythm”]
item.content:
Release Notes and System Updates

Call Notes:

  • Tuned Global
  • Apps to see?
  • Search/Rec APIs
    • Existing: Many object search (Rec contextual to store)
    • Upcoming:

[Diagram: Box containing “Wilson Scoring System” with arrow pointing down to “Elastic Scoring System”]

  • Adobe shutting us off (traffic ↗)
  • Update package from Mega

[Diagram: Box containing “Universal Music Group in Tuned Catalogue - Music in Demo”]

  • AppLovin Rewarded Videos Ad

Pre-tagging Tuned Global for Cold Start

[Diagram: Parallelogram shape containing “Playful Rewards (Userwise) Playful Rhythm”]

TikTok in Store??? [shown in separate box in upper right]

- 3% margin to user - 97% for us 👀

- per hour - all packages - Android only

Dropped Out Issue with guided install

☐ UX optimizations + segment optimizations ☐ PR Android app time (Ollur/tracking) ☐ Rhythm?

Next steps ➤ 9+ update? Storage Parsing? Naahh…

RELEASE

UW Updates

L7 Time Tracking ⤷ Segment (Easy filtering?) ** Updates** ** ⤷ Rhythm**

Diagrams Present:

  1. System Architecture Box: Wilson Scoring System transitioning to Elastic Scoring System
  2. Music Integration Box: Universal Music Group integration with Tuned Catalogue
  3. Rewards System Parallelogram: Showing Playful Rewards and Rhythm features
  4. Revenue Split Box: TikTok integration question with margin breakdown

The notes appear to be from a product development meeting covering system updates, third-party integrations, monetization strategies, and upcoming release plans.

item.title: ## Development Tasks and Planning Notes - May 29, 2025
item.description: Development Tasks and Planning Notes - May 29, 2025 IntelliJ: RedKit Book → Tado → Obsidian RacketBook → Markdown → Obsidian General ToDo Remove david@username.io lucky/kiwi G(?)P Auth screen Adobe/Playtime SDK upgrade to 310: Playful Reworks Server ToDo Save new onboarding Kiwi Data Add promo code encoding Add 10% boost functionality Swap Remaining Keys Update Apploin to support Kiwi Add New Kiwi Content Sections Clue Section Horizontal Hotlink Section LevelUp Game Overview Client ToDo Update app-id to be Kiwi Update DoT + Gender to match Tech Update last name audit[?
item.content:
Development Tasks and Planning Notes - May 29, 2025

IntelliJ:

  • RedKit Book → Tado → Obsidian
  • RacketBook → Markdown → Obsidian

General ToDo

  • Remove david@username.io lucky/kiwi G(?)P Auth screen
  • Adobe/Playtime SDK upgrade to 310: Playful Reworks

Server ToDo

  • Save new onboarding Kiwi Data
  • Add promo code encoding
  • Add 10% boost functionality
  • Swap Remaining Keys
  • Update Apploin to support Kiwi
  • Add New Kiwi Content Sections
    • Clue Section Horizontal
    • Hotlink Section
  • LevelUp Game Overview

Client ToDo

  • Update app-id to be Kiwi
  • Update DoT + Gender to match Tech
  • Update last name audit[?]

Note: There appears to be some additional text marked as “Swab[?] 6th” in the Client ToDo section that is partially unclear.

The note shows a typical development sprint planning format with tasks organized by component (General, Server, Client) and includes some completed items that have been crossed out in the IntelliJ section.
